website_summaries.verdict: Strong and powerful, yet lightweight and easy on the wrists, this is the tool massage therapists reach for when their own muscles need some TLC. A high-quality handheld massager that delivers fast relief.
pros: Ultra powerful 3700 rpm motor makes quick work of tight muscles and painful knots
Variable speeds allow users to customize intensity
Long handle offers easy access to the entire back
Fast charging battery lasts up to 120 minutes on a single charge
cons: Pricey, but the quality is exceptional

customer_reviews.text: Love the lifetime warranty. Love all the attachments that come with it. It feels very well made and of good quality. Has a lot of power that’s a huge plus .. customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

This model is not in any way. Battery life is more than respectable. You’ll get many massages out of a charge. Very highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful - Good Battery - Awesome Heads
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic neck and sciatic pain. I bought this because my $30 Braun massager died after only a year. The Mighty Bliss is a huge leap up from the Braun. Highly recommended!

I’m super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jake K

customer_reviews.text: PureWave is far superior hands down. I was disappointed I couldn't use it while charging so I ordered this one also. I feel bad giving such a low review, but I can't really recommend this product at this price.

customer_reviews.text: I've invested in a few massage items over the years but so far this has been the most effective. It's a bit awkward to use in the mid-back region but not too tricky. The adjustable speed is nice, though I find anything less than the highest setting feels clunky. Overall I am quite pleased with this massager. I try to use it before bedtime and usually it helps me relax and fall asleep quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Candis

customer_reviews.text: I've tried other handhelds to help work out tightness/knots/pain in my shoulders, neck, legs, but this one is by far the best. It's lightweight, with a longer handle than some. The battery holds a long charge. I appreciate the ease with which one increases/decreases intensity. I would say the highest intensity is medium-to-high, depending on your tolerance; for me, it's an excellent medium intensity. The various heads, designed for working different areas most effectively, are terrific. I use this on a daily basis when I knock off work - am at a computer all day, and it helps a great deal. I'm recommending this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sister

customer_reviews.title: Helps me get relief in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I have health issues that reduce my mobility and because of that I get knots in my back and my legs. Because of this I take muscle relaxers and pain medication. Growing tired of the medication and the side effects I looked for something that could help me that didn’t involve taking a pill for relief. After reading many reviews I bought the Mighty Bliss to massage my troubles away. Well let me tell you I love my Mighty Bliss after some trial and error I found the right massage head and the right speed and in 5 minutes I can break up the knots for an almost instant relief. I am very happy with my Mighty Bliss.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product-Great for muscle recovery
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product, which I use multiple times daily. I waited to write a review, in order to test the immediate durability. So far I have had zero issues, and it works the same as when I bought it. I have yet o utilize the customer service, however they seem to be at-the-ready. The only feedback I have on the product itself is the percussive depth- it would be nice if it would “push” deeper on each cycle. So when using it in a low setting, one could get deeper into the muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Stev

customer_reviews.title: Best handheld massager.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. As a bodybuilder, I love to use this product after workouts for muscle recovery. I also used the massager to alleviate muscle knots and it worked great. My wife also used this for lower back pain and it really helped her. Overall, great product, love the various attachments s, long battery life, and easy usage. I truly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I've been using it on the backs of my heels for tendonitis relief, which it does a great job of. Yesterday, (about a month after purchasing it) I had a muscle spasm in my back. Hit it with the mighty bliss for about 20 minutes, lied down for an hour, and the spasm was completely gone. I could still feel the ache of a strained muscle, and mighty bliss is making that better too. I've used massagers in the past and never liked them. This one is very different from anything I've ever tried before. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this massager. I was debating whether to get this one or others. Upon reading the reviews I decided to go with this one and let me tell you, I’m so glad I did. This massager really pummels and gets in there. It has definitely reduced my pain in my shoulders and lower back. Battery life is awesome too, it lasts for a long while and it charges quickly too. Definitely recommend this massager to anyone in search of one. The price is pretty decent compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: didn't work worth a @&*$%
customer_reviews.text: How did such a crappy product get so many good reviews. For pitty-sake stick with a corded messager. The battery on this starts to run down fast/right away. Only a couple of minutes into using, and the battery is so degraded that you have to charge again to get the full feel of it. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Such a great massage tool
customer_reviews.text: This is the best massager I have owned. It is wonderful and the attachments are very versatile. My favorite is the acupuncture attachment. I suffer from arthritis and it does wonders for my hands, wrist and feet. The bow looking attachment is great on my neck. Massages deep. It is very lightweight and I love plugging it in and within less than an hour, it is charged and ready to go. It lasts for days. The price cannot be beat for such a great tool! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: High Desert Living

customer_reviews.title: Improved My Life During Covid Lockdown
customer_reviews.text: I was in trouble with back pain during lockdown because my Swedish Massage Therapist was also locked down. My back pain was debilitating and not controlled by pain medication. Mighty Bliss got the pain under control and started me on a slow recovery until I had access again to my Swedish Massage Therapist. Now I use it between visits and it releases the knots every time. I like the variety of heads and the fact that I can bear down very hard without stalling the motor. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: The best massager I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing massager I have yet to own. I have a stressful job and a lot of sore muscles at the end of the day. This little hand held massager is pure magic. I can reach all of the parts of my back that I couldn't with any other machine and it is so powerful I am literally in heaven before I'm done. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good handheld massager. My friends and family all take turns with it when they come over.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this back massager. The long handle makes it easy for me to reach all areas of my back. I have nerve damage in my legs from knee surgery and when it starts to hurt, I use the Mighty Bliss in that area and it really helps the pain go away. The attachments are great and not hard like some others we have tried and are big enough to cover larger areas of the body. It is very lightweight but powerful. It is perfect. I would highly recommend this massager.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Great stress release and post workout product.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews of hand held massagers, others claimed the “Mighty Bliss” was the one to buy. I whole heartedly agree. This has been great for sore and/or tight muscles. Not for just a post workout but after or during work. Helps take the stress off your shoulders, sides, arms, legs...etc. I’ve used while watching TV not realizing I was stressed. Good variation in intensity. I actually bought this for my partner who has restless leg syndrome. Helps tremendously for that. The design makes it easy to hold and apply self back massages. Battery life lasts a long time. Packaged very well. Over all, an excellent product. Funny name but it works. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Mighty Bliss massager!
customer_reviews.text: This massager is amazing! I have sciatica really bad that causes numbness and tightness from my left buttock, down my thigh and and calf. The muscles in my thigh have been tight like a knot the past 3 years and nothing seemed to relive it until today. I received and charged my Mighty Bliss cordless massager today, and baby!, the tightness is gone! I feel so much better! I'm so glad I purchased this! It is so worth the money. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dimples_48

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful device!!
customer_reviews.text: For sore, knotted-up muscles, the Mighty Bliss is awesome! My masseuse used a similar device last time I went in for a massage. I thought, "I gotta get me one of those." My daughter sent me an Amazon gift card for Father's Day, so I decided to add a bit more and get the Bliss. It seemed the best value among similar devices. The battery life is great! It's easy to use and very effective for taking out knots, working over tendons, massaging the lower back and hips. My wife has enjoyed my gift, too, especially with the attachment to use with massage oil.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Green

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed unable to use because of medical warnings.
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to give a product review on this item because I am not able to use it. There are medical warnings in the brochure that you have no way of knowing until you receive the massager and read the directions. The medical warnings are on the last page of the directions. I would return this item but getting around is difficult for me.
customer_reviews.author: iva barnes

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I got this in January and I have only used it a handful of times. Only my husband and I used it so no hard use to account for it breaking. We were using it two weeks ago when something in the motor stopped working or separated. I can't fix it because whatever broke is on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Shurtz

customer_reviews.title: You Owe It To Yourself!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this item for me a few months ago and I deliberately held off on offering a review, until I had time to use the massager a few times, and so far I am very pleased. I have become so spolied with having this handy massager available, and when my tired and aching muscles request some attention I enjoy having it at my disposal as needed. I am looking now to order some additional massage heads to use with my amazing massager!
customer_reviews.author: Tamika L.

customer_reviews.title: This Mighty Bliss Massager is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible sciatic nerve pain and also frequent neck pain. This massager takes care of both. I love all the different massage heads. I was skeptical when I bought it but I am often in so much pain I was willing to try anything. This massager literally takes my pain away. It pinpoints the pain and massages deeply when you want it to. It is really well-built and easy to hold. The battery life is long, I haven't run out of juice yet. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cutitloose

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck, back, and feet!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Theragun but it's too powerful for some areas and can't get to the neck or back. This Massager completes the job for what the Theragun can't do. It's strong enough and also quiet enough that we can use it while watching TV. One thing can be improved is a dedicated power button instead of turning the knob to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: mau

customer_reviews.title: I’ve found PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: I have a wallpapering business and have been hanging for 35 years. Needless to say, my neck and shoulders are in pain everyday. I have tried every product on the market to help relieve my pain. They’re either too bulky and heavy, have a poor battery life, or don’t have to power to deliver the impact needed for my sore muscles! I have found my answer!!!!! This little guy is AMAZING!! It’s design makes it easy to reach any area of my back with ease and it’s strong and consistent! At a fraction of the competitors price, it’s a win-win!! Absolutely LOVE this Mighty Bliss!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Turner

customer_reviews.title: Best relieve for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering with feet pain for about 25 years. Getting worst every year. I have tried all there to try, and I mean all. The Mighty Bliss has help me. I still have pain but not as much. I only use one attachment it's rubber and like a mushroom. I gave up trap shooting about one and half years ago and now I'm back. I put my walkers away and use my cane very little. It is worth what it cost and more for me. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: My doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: Its been amazing for relieving my neck and lower back pain! I’ve had for over a month. My doctor recommended it for my neck pain associated with stress. I have to say this thing worked great. It’s worth the price. The battery lasts for days, but I usually charge it after I use it. Then I unplug once it’s charged. It is easy to use and has a long handle. It comes with a variety of heads, but I need one of them. My husband likes the vibration it makes on his side of the bed when I’m massaging my neck and back. It’s a good product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cepie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device after my chiropractor started using a massager on my aching back and hip. While not "professional strength", the Mighty Bliss nevertheless allows me to work out the knots in my back, hip and shoulders after a day spent scrunched in an office chair. I don't think it will totally replace my trips to the chiropractor, but I'm definitely seeing him less often while remaining comfortably mobile. This is definitely a high quality, personal use device.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Finally pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Long story short, I injured my back during a bike ride and needed something to help ease the pain. This massager literally hit the spot. It comes with a variety of attachments to help manage different areas that are in pain. I’ve even started to use it to help with neck stiffness. The settings allow you to transition gradually from a gentle pulsation to a stronger vibration. The wand like design makes it easy to hold and maneuver by yourself or for someone else. The battery life is great too! I highly recommend this to anyone looking for muscle pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Well-made, Attractive Ergonomic Therapeutic
customer_reviews.text: The Mighty Bliss arrived in sleek packaging. The product has a nice glossy finish, looks very high end. It is smooth and ergonomic and pleasant to use. There is a good variety of massage heads. (I have settled on the broadest, rather flat one but that's just personal preference.) There is plenty of power, battery life is not an issue, always goes 100% strong as long as the session goes. (I am in the habit of plugging it in when I put it away.) The adjustable frequency knob is ergonomic and smooth and solid and gives a wide range of intensity. There is nothing to complain about with Might Bliss. I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sooth

customer_reviews.title: helpful
customer_reviews.text: This massager seems well-constructed. A big asset is its weight: It is not too heavy, compared to other massagers on the market. I use this massager mainly on the back of my thigh. It has been somewhat helpful in reducing pain. It is not as useful for the buttocks area, because of the thicker tissue there. Getting at buttocks trigger points requires either a lacrosse-type ball or a more powerful (and probably heavier) massager.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have some bulging discs in my neck that cause the muscles in my left shoulder to get rock hard and radiate pain down my left arm. The mighty bliss has been a God send with being able to loosen the muscle up and get immediate pain relief. As a bonus the battery life is all you will ever need and recharges with the included cord. I mainly use the round head and the rectangle head on my shoulder and back and love the added bonus of a head to use for a head massage on low speed. Wish I had ordered sooner, don't wait if you are in pain
customer_reviews.author: KayakFisherman 3207

customer_reviews.title: works great - very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have a sciatica nerve issue in my lower back and this product gives me great relief for a couple of days so that I can back to my routine and have a painless schedule. Although the product doesn't cure the root cause but provides fast relief. I am sure there are many massagers in the market but I didn't have time and I was experiencing a lot of pain so I went by review and purchased this product. I hope this product should be more economical.
customer_reviews.author: A Shah

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this massager because I suffer from chronic back pain along with sciatica and I started having foot pain too. I use it therapeutically, I’d say every day, sometimes twice daily. It really does help ease tension in my lower back and neck. But, I actually use it on my face and scalp too. It’s excellent for circulation and it’s solidly made too. I expect to be using this for a long time to come. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Reany aka IreneH

customer_reviews.title: Promises big, but fails to deliver. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Promises deep tissue massage and strong power, but I was left underwhelmed and dissapointed. If you apply any pressure at all the device chugs down and clearly struggles, and I don't even like that much pressure. Returned the device and getting a serious massage gun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The name says it all!
customer_reviews.text: Bar none, this is the most satisfying percussion massager that I have ever used. The plus is that it is cordless which allows one far more access to areas around the body. This massager even beats percussion massagers that offer heat! The price is worth every penny, and there are more than ample replacement heads to experiment with! I'm so pleased with this product I'm considering buying another to give as a gift. Gratitude!
customer_reviews.author: P A

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price, by far
customer_reviews.text: The mighty bliss massager really delivered what was advertised. I've had chronic back and neck and hip (and wrist...the list goes on) for my whole life and my chiropractor recommended a percussionist massager to loosen up my tight muscles. This thing provides relief! I was skeptical and read a bunch of reviews and compared products for a while but I am completely satisfied with the mighty bliss! The 6-ball head really breaks up my knots and I can actually stretch after I use this thing! Highly recommend. The charge lasts long enough for multiple uses, and the many options of attachments are great for many different pains.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Villescas

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: I like the handle, I like it brings like 6 different head to change for specific problems. I love you can actually use it for your feet, your neck, your back. I dont like is a little heavy so if I'm doing a massage to myself I get tired quickly. I can use it multiple times in a week and the battery last, only reason I hace charged it is because my husband was afraid it might ran out of battery in the middle of the massage after like 6 or 7 uses. I started excersicing and got a real painful muscle spasm in my shoulder blades kind of and after 2 uses it helped relieve my pain.
customer_reviews.author: Shesy Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly God send! I’ve been looking for something to help me with sores and aches from working out, and my son is also a high school football player who is always looking for relief from a hard practice. The Mighty blues has brought relief into out home, we absolutely love it. Funny thing is I brought it for my husband for Father’s Day and we all take turns using it. What I love the most is how powerful it is, you can definitely get a deep message while using Mighty Bliss! I 100% recommend this product for all muscle pain relief and it also makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Dina Paret

customer_reviews.title: the wireless unit is the best to work with
customer_reviews.text: I will never be without this massager. It is cordless and easy to handle and I use it twice a day. The relief I get from this product is worth it's weight in gold. My first one had an attached cord. It's week area was where the cord attached to the unit. I had it for several years. When I saw this one with no cord, I figured it was a very good product. It did not let me down. Worth it's weight in gold..
customer_reviews.author: carolyn cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Reduced and eliminated pain from computer repetitive stress injury
customer_reviews.text: Was having a lot of pain in my forearm and wrist. Turned this device to max and used it all over my forearm. Arm was sore the next day, but that's too be expected on deep massages, and resumed use the following day. After a few days, overall pain levels were greatly reduced. In a week or so, my pain was gone. Now I use it sparingly as a preventative measure to keep the pain away for good. Love this product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Quick Relief!
customer_reviews.text: The Mighty Bliss is awesome! It helped resolve a problem I had with a knot in my neck that was pressing on nerves causing discomfort, headache across back of skill and dizziness. I used a heating pad first on the area and then the Mighty Blizzard with the small attachment and within 24 hours I had relief. I have since used it for areas in my back. It is easy to use and the long handle is helpful for the back. It charges pretty fast and has a good battery life. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works as anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: This is a true massage. Mighty bliss is weighted enough to not bounce around (my only worry) so you are getting a great, sustained, spot massage. I highly recommend this product! Also, cordless power is so strong, my back and shoulder tension is relieved long before I have to recharge. In fact, the charge has held so long, I have been able to use Mighty Bliss without recharge more than once. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this unit to work out chronic tightness in my calves. It seems to be of good quality and has good battery life. The speed adjustment gives a nice range of effects from a lower speed high amplitude to more of a vibration. I found it easy to handle and it was helpful in loosening up my tight muscles. It comes with a useful variety of attachments. All in all I am very pleased for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!! I really recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I am accompanied by pain and itching when my feet are pressed or touched. But I used MIGHTY BLISS Four Head Stick to massage my instep, soles and even toe development. However, I feel the warmth in my feet and the difference is so obvious that the pain disappears and the circulation goes to my legs. Of course, I should continue to massage. Until the symptoms disappear. I really recommend it. My son also enjoys calf massage.
customer_reviews.author: GeeSung

customer_reviews.title: A great tool at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool to use on myself as well as for my massage practice. It's a great tool. It holds the charge for a long time and charges up quickly and the vibration/ percussion is very powerful for a device that's not attached to the wall. I also appreciate the different attachments, particularly the most narrow for working into attachment sites. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: BEST MASSAGER EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing massager I have ever bought and so much more affordable than one you might buy from sharper image! It has several different massage heads and gives you instructions on which ones are good for different areas or types of pain. I work on my feet all day and carry all my stress in my shoulders and this covers both, plus theres a scalp massager and its cordless! On top of all of those functions- did I mention theres 3 speeds, and it looks super fly, the business owner sends you a hand written note for buying his product, how sweet is that?! Sharper image doesnt do that! I can't reccomend this item enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: This massager is amazing! I love that there are multiple attachments that are easy to switch out, the battery life is great, it even works while its plugged in to the charger! You can adjust the speed and the handle makes it easy to reach down your back. The price seemed a little high at first but it is well worth it. No more waiting on someone to get the knots out of your back or the kink out of your neck. Really helps to relieve plantar fasciitis pain with minimal effort as well!
customer_reviews.author: Keeks

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my feet and calves. It helps improve my circulation and relieves my plantar fasciitis pain. My husband uses it to help loosen up before playing golf. We have yet to run the charge out because it really holds a charge well. It arrived quickly in a sturdy storage box with a safety seal. Best of all, it was priced at a fraction of the cost of the ones heavily promoted on Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Thargrove

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! The reviews were right.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this massager because it had the best reviews and I’m definitely not disappointed. I love the different attachments. The battery life is great. It’s never died on me while in use. I did follow instructions and I fully charged it before my 1st use, so remember to do that. It’s been great for back pain and my sciatica nerve pain as well. Definitely a good buy. I highly recommend this product and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jameril Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My father loved it! Uses for back pain.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my father, who suffers from lower back pain. He has been using it for a few months now and absolutely loves it. When I asked him if he used it, he said "every day." It has helped his pain immensely. The product is well made, durable and after a few months of everyday use, it still runs smoothly. I plan on purchasing one myself after hearing my father talk about it. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager! It's comfortable to hold and use, especially on yourself which isn't always the case with other massagers. I was actually torn between two different massagers and while this one was more expensive it was calling my name! I'm glad I spent the money and I would do it again!! The different attachments can tackle any ache or pain and the adjustable speed makes it simple to find the perfect combination for your trouble spot! This is a great buy and I suggest everyone own one, it makes life better!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
